id: scenario-value-scanner-preteen-scenarios-family-family decision making includes preteen's substantial input
title: Family decision making includes preteen's substantial input
description: Family decision making includes preteen's substantial input
content:
Scenario: Family decision making includes preteen's substantial input
    Given Marcus has real knowledge of household needs and constraints
    And he manages daily household operations
    When family decisions about resources are made
    Then Marcus's input should carry genuine weight
    And his knowledge should inform family planning
    And the family_elohim should surface his insights to Sarah
    And his voice should be respected as informed perspective
    And family governance should reflect that he has legitimate standing
    And his participation should be meaningful, not token
